title: Harmonization tool Future — toolHarmonizeFuture
text: Like harmonization tools mrdrivers, toolHarmonizeFuture takes two magpie objects, 'past' 'future', returns single magpie object, .e. harmonized time-series. case, harmonized time-series always equal 'future', years 'future'. harmonized time-series depends 'method' argument chosen.

title: Harmonization tool Future — toolHarmonizeFuture
text: past magpie object. future magpie object one scenario/datatype, .e. length third dimension 1. method string defining harmonization method: "level": harmonized time-series exactly equal 'past' years first year 'future'. "growth": harmonized time-series follows growth rates 'past', years first year 'future'.

title: Harmonization tool Future — toolHarmonizeFuture
text: magpie object dimensions 'past'.

title: Harmonization tool Future — toolHarmonizeFuture
text: 'past' object multiple scenarios/datatypes, .e. length third dimension larger 1, harmonized time-series created every scenario/datatype past. 'future' object used every case - hence requirement 'future' one scenario/datatype.

title: Harmonization tool Past — toolHarmonizePast
text: Like harmonization tools mrdrivers, toolHarmonizePast takes two magpie objects, 'past' 'future', returns single magpie object, .e. harmonized time-series. case, harmonized time-series always equal 'past', years 'past'. harmonized time-series depends 'method' argument chosen.

title: Harmonization tool Past — toolHarmonizePast
text: past magpie object one scenario/datatype, .e. length third dimension 1. future magpie object. method string defining harmonization method: "level": harmonized time-series exactly equal 'future' years last year 'past'. "growth": harmonized time-series follows growth rates 'future', years last year 'past'. "transition": harmonized time-series transitions 'future' year 'yEnd'. yEnd, harmonized time-series equal 'future'. transition phase, share absolute difference past' future' last year past' added future. share starts 1 last year 'past' decreases linearly 0 yEnd. yEnd Additional input "transition" method.
